# Material and Methods

How does a simple equation look like?

<br>

$$a^2 = b^2 + c^2$$

<br>

## Complex equation

Lets try a more complex equation:

<br>

$$
b_{sol_i} = 
 \begin{cases}
  1, & \text{if}\ a_{mss_j} \leq b_i \leq a_{mss_{j + 1}}\ \text{and}\ j = 1 \\ 
  1, & \text{if}\ a_{mss_j} < b_i \leq a_{mss_{j + 1}}\ \text{and}\ j > 1 \\ 
  0, & \text{otherwise}
 \end{cases}
$$

<br>
